segments.text: I see the boy climbing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, stretching his little body as far as it can go.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous watching him, that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in one hand, trying to catch cookies with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's done this before, or if it's his first cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him looks so eager, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their teamwork, even if it's a bit dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they don't hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware, which makes me even more nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they'll be okay, but I can't help but worry a little.
segments.speaker: PAR
